p: The microstructure of the samples tempered at 620 Â°C for 2 h and 32 h and characterized by EBSD is shown in Figure 4. The color represents the crystallographic orientation in Figure 4a,b. It can be seen that there are multiple martensite crystallographic orientations within the prior austenite grains. The martensite structure consists of packets and blocks of different colors and orientations.
